msg: Convenience for running tidy.sf.net on a single xml file.

msg: Fix getConnectionManager method, allow navigation through actual objects rather than names through ResourceAdapterModule tree

author: jsdelfino
msg: cleaned up the assembly model to facilitate code generation, renamed some of the classes and adjusted hierarchies to introduce Composite and Atomic components, changed maps used in the model to live maps, moved context factories to Component, EntryPoint and ExternalService, and simplified the logic in some of the initialize and freeze methods, see http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/ws-tuscany-dev/200604.mbox/%3c443BE17D.4090504@apache.org%3e for more info
